assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: During the course, the basic methods used in humanities studies will be introduced and their possibilities for implementation in specific disciplines will be discussed. The course provides elementary knowledge about writing scientific papers. Along with theoretical lectures and seminars, an article will be written in the first half of the course on the topic chosen for the research paper. The course will end with the presentation and defence of a research paper.
description.et: Kursuse käigus tutvutakse humantitaarteaduste põhiliste meetoditega ning arutletakse nende rakendamisvõimaluste üle konkreetses distsipliinis. Kursus annab algteadmised teadusliku töö kirjutamiseks. Teoreetiliste loengute ja seminaride kõrval kirjutatakse kursuse esimeses pooles artikkel uurmistööks valitud teemal. Ainekursus lõppeb uurmistöö esitamisega ja kaitsmisega.

objectives.en: The course will provide the basic skills for writing and formalising scientific research papers.
objectives.et: Kursus annab algõppe teadusliku töö kirjutamiseks ja vormistamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: A student that completes the course:
- will be familiar with the most widespread methods used in humanities studies;
- will know how to collect the materials necessary for a research paper;
- will be able to independently write shorter research papers.
